doc_description: This document is a credit agreement dated March 29, 2023, between Subrogation Holdings, LLC as Borrower, MSP Recovery, LLC as Owner Pledgor and Guarantor, Hazel Holdings I LLC as Lender and Administrative Agent, and MSP Recovery Claims, Series LLC – Series 15-09-321 as Assignee. It outlines the terms and conditions of a term loan facility, including definitions, loan terms, yield protection, guaranty, conditions precedent, representations and warranties, covenants, events of default, and miscellaneous provisions.

structure.title: Definitions and Interpretation
structure.summary: This section provides definitions for terms used throughout the credit agreement and outlines the rules for interpreting the document.
structure.text: The following terms used herein, including in the introductory paragraph, recitals, exhibits and schedules hereto, shall have the following meanings: '2022 Borrower' means La Ley con John H. Ruiz P.A., d/b/a MSP Recovery Law Firm, a Florida corporation, and MSP Law Firm, PLLC, a Florida professional limited liability company, jointly and severally. '2022 Credit Agreement' means the Credit Agreement dated as of June 16, 2022, among La Ley Con John H. Ruiz PA., d/b/a MSP Recovery Law Firm, and MSP Law Firm, PLLC, jointly and severally, as Borrower, MSP1 Funding 2022, LLC, as Lender and as Administrative Agent and Deer Finance, LLC, as Servicer.

structure.title: The Loan
structure.summary: This section details the terms of the term loan, including the amount, interest rates, repayment schedule, and conditions for prepayment.
structure.text: Section 2.1 Term Loan. Section 2.2 Pro Rata Shares; Availability of Funds. Section 2.3 Evidence of Debt; Register; Lenders’ Books and Records; Notes. Section 2.4 Scheduled Principal Payments. Section 2.5 Interest on Loan.

structure.title: Yield Protection
structure.summary: This section outlines the provisions for protecting the lender's yield, including increased costs and taxes.
structure.text: Section 3.2 Increased Costs. Section 3.3 Taxes. Section 3.4 Mitigation Obligations; Designation of a Different Lending Office.

structure.title: The Guaranty
structure.summary: This section describes the guaranty obligations of the Owner Pledgor and the conditions under which the guaranty is enforceable.
structure.text: Section 4.1 The Guaranty. Section 4.2 Obligations Unconditional. Section 4.3 Reinstatement. Section 4.4 Certain Additional Waivers.

structure.title: Conditions Precedent
structure.summary: This section lists the conditions that must be met before the loan can be disbursed.

structure.text: Section 6.1 Organization; Requisite Power and Authority; Qualification. Section 6.2 Equity Interests and Ownership. Section 6.3 Due Authorization.

structure.title: Affirmative Covenants
structure.summary: This section outlines the affirmative covenants that the Borrower must adhere to, including reporting requirements and compliance with laws.

structure.title: Negative Covenants
